content: Is there a maximal message length on zulip? [If so, why wouldn't they cut you off after too many characters?] I keep getting an error: "Error editing message: Unable to render message". It's the long "PNT+: Outstanding Tasks" message; I'm trying to update it and zulip won't let me. (I already had to break it into a bunch of pieces, but now first one can't be modified.. perhaps because it's so long?)

image.png
It's lying, it is able to render the message. But it seems unable (or unwilling!) to send it...??

I think that sounds like it is blowing up trying to parse the message rather than length maybe? At least if you trust the error message -- which a quick search of the Zulip tracker maybe confirms (https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/22287) -- perhaps put it in a gist on GitHub and someone / I can try to figure out what bit is blowing Zulip up
